createWindow.name: createWindow
createWindow.description: The function called to create an input helper window.

getItems.name: getItems
getItems.description: The function called to return an array of the InputHelperItem objects that contain all the items from the input helper.

setItems.name: setItems
setItems.description: The function called to set the items to the input helper.

params.description: Defines an array of the InputHelperItem objects which contain all the items for the input helper.

show.name: show
show.description: The function called to show an input helper.

params.name: width
params.description: The input helper window width measured in millimeters.

params.name: height
params.description: The input helper window height measured in millimeters.

params.name: isCaptureKeyboard
params.description: Defines if the keyboard is caught (true) or not (false).

unShow.name: unShow
unShow.description: The function called to hide an input helper.

getScrollSizes.name: getScrollSizes
getScrollSizes.description: The function called to get the sizes of the input helper scrolled window. Returns an object with width and height parameters.
